application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details submitted pursuant to reference 24/00903/FUL: dust (5), SuDS (6), enclosure (8), crossover (9), cycle parking (10) and hard and soft landscaping (13) in respect of sub-division of the site and erection of a 2-storey 2 bed dwelling house at side with vehicular access and hardstanding to existing house.
decision_conditions: Sufficient information has been provided to demonstrate compliance with the requirements of conditions (Nos. 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 and 13). Therefore, it is held that the submission complies with the adopted policies from the London Plan (2021), the Development Management Document (2014), Core Strategy (2010), and the National Planning Policy Framework (NPPF, 2024). Accordingly, the conditions are DISCHARGED.

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: LHA Maximum Height Level: All buildings, structures, and works exceeding 150 metres in height (492.1 feet).
